description: [QUADAGENT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0269) was likely obfuscated using Invoke-Obfuscation.(Citation: Unit 42 QUADAGENT July 2018)(Citation: GitHub Invoke-Obfuscation)

external_references.description: Lee, B., Falcone, R. (2018, July 25). OilRig Targets Technology Service Provider and Government Agency with QUADAGENT. Retrieved August 9, 2018.
Bohannon, D.. (2017, March 13). Invoke-Obfuscation - PowerShell Obfuscator. Retrieved June 18, 2017.
